TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ApplicationBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供与当前应用程序相关的属性、方法和事件。

span.span: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象公开的属性 `My.Application` 返回仅与当前应用程序或 DLL 关联的数据。The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL. 无法使用 `My.Application` 更改任何系统级信息。No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`. `My.Application` 对象由以下类组成：The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - 提供了所有项目中的可用成员。 provides members that are available in all projects. - 提供 Windows 窗体应用程序中可用的成员。 provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications. - 提供控制台应用程序中可用的成员。 provides members that are available in console applications. ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` 方法获取并显示 PATH 环境变量的值（如果此值可用）。This example uses the `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method to get and display the value of the PATH environment variable, if this value is available. 否则，它将显示一条消息，指示路径环境变量不存在。Otherwise, it displays a message that indicates that the PATH environment variable does not exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void ChangeCulture(string cultureName) cil managed

param.name: cultureName
param.span: 字符串形式的区域性名称。

span.span: Name of the culture as a string.

param.span: 有关可能名称的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of possible names, see .

summary.span: 更改当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。

span.span: Changes the culture used by the current thread for string manipulation and for string formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.ChangeCulture`方法更改当前线程的 属性。The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method changes the current thread's property. 确定该线程上所有计算的日期、时间、货币、数字、文本排序顺序、字符串比较和大小写的默认格式。 determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, numbers, sorting order of text, string comparisons, and casing for all computations on that thread. 若要检索当前区域性，可以使用 属性或 属性。To retrieve the current culture, you can use the property or the property. 此 设置与语言设置不同。The setting is different from a language setting. 它仅包含与地理区域的标准设置相关的数据。It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region. 因此， 属性只能设置为特定区域性或 。Therefore, the property can only be set to a specific culture or to the . 使用 `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` 方法可更改当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。Use the `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources. > [!IMPORTANT] > `My.Application.ChangeCulture`方法要求 具有具有集的 。The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method requires a with the set. 由于与线程关联的安全状态，因此操作线程是危险的。Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads. 因此，只有在需要时才应向可信代码提供此权限。Therefore, this permission should be given only as necessary to trustworthy code. 不能在不完全受信任的代码中更改线程的区域性。You cannot change a thread's culture in semi-trusted code. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例演示更改区域性如何更改日期的字符串表示形式。This example demonstrates how changing the culture changes the string representation of dates. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是有效的区域性名称。

span.span: is not a valid culture name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void ChangeUICulture(string cultureName) cil managed

param.name: cultureName
param.span: 字符串形式的区域性名称。

span.span: Name of the culture as a string.

param.span: 有关可能名称的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of possible names, see .

summary.span: 更改当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。

span.span: Changes the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法更改当前线程的 属性。The `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method changes the current thread's property. 属性确定资源管理器和对象使用的区域性 `My.Resources` ; 它使用此信息在运行时查找区域性特定的资源。The property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object; it uses this information to look up culture-specific resources at run time. 若要检索当前 UI 区域性，可以使用 属性或 属性。To retrieve the current UI culture, you can use the property or the property. 使用 `My.Application.ChangeCulture` 方法可更改当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。Use the `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` 方法设置 `My.Resources` 对象用于检索资源的区域性。This example uses the `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method to set the culture that the `My.Resources` object uses for retrieving resources. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyResources#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyResources/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 要使此示例正常运行，应用程序必须 `Message` 在应用程序的资源文件中包含一个名为的字符串，应用程序应具有该资源文件的法语区域性版本 `Resources.fr-FR.resx` 。For this example to work, your application must have a string named `Message` in the application's resource file, and the application should have the French-culture version of that resource file, `Resources.fr-FR.resx`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：添加或删除资源](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d). 如果应用程序没有该资源文件的法语区域性版本，则 `My.Resources` 对象将从默认区域性资源文件中检索资源。If the application does not have the French-culture version of that resource file, the `My.Resources` object retrieves the resource from the default-culture resource file.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是有效的区域性名称。

span.span: is not a valid culture name.
Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Culture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。

span.span: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。

span.span: A object that represents the culture the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.CurrentCulture`属性获取 当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的对象。The `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property gets the object that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting. 此对象与属性返回的对象相同 ，后者控制该线程上的许多与字符串相关的计算。This object is identical to the one returned by the property, which controls many of the string-related computations on that thread. 属性确定日期、时间、货币和数字的默认格式。The property determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, and numbers. 它还确定如何对字符串进行排序、比较和大写。It also determines how to sort, compare, and capitalize strings. 若要更改区域性，可以使用 方法或为属性分配不同的 对象 。To change the culture, you can use the method or assign a different object to the property. 此 设置与语言设置不同。The setting is different from a language setting. 它仅包含与地理区域的标准设置相关的数据。It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region. 使用 `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` 属性可以获取当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。Use the `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例演示区域性如何影响日期的字符串表示形式。This example demonstrates how the culture affects the string representation of dates. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string GetEnvironmentVariable(string name) cil managed
Public Function GetEnvironmentVariable (name As String) As String

span.span: A containing the name of the environment variable.

summary.span: 返回指定环境变量的值。

span.span: Returns the value of the specified environment variable.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含名为 的环境变量的值。

span.span: A containing the value of the environment variable with the name .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable`方法返回名为的环境变量 `name` 。The `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method returns the environment variable with the name `name`. 此方法类似于 ，不同之处在于，如果指定的环境变量不存在，则此方法将引发异常 `name` 。This method is similar to , except that this method raises an exception if the environment variable specified by `name` does not exist. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` 方法获取并显示 PATH 环境变量的值（如果可用）。This example uses the `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method to get and display the value of the PATH environment variable, if available. 否则，它将显示一条消息，指示路径环境变量不存在。Otherwise, it displays a message indicating that the PATH environment variable does not exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

span.span: The object for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.Info.Version` 属性来显示应用程序的版本。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application. summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象提供用来将事件和异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器的属性和方法。

span.span: Gets an object that provides properties and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.

value.span: 当前应用程序的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本示例将演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法来记录跟踪信息。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：编写日志消息](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UICulture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ UICulture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。

span.span: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。

span.span: A object that represents the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.CurrentUICulture`属性获取 当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的对象。The `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property gets the object that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources. 此对象与属性返回的对象相同 。This object is identical to the one returned by the property. 属性确定资源管理器和对象所使用的区域性 `My.Resources` ，它需要在运行时查找区域性特定的资源。The property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object, information it needs to look up culture-specific resources at run time. 若要更改区域性，可以使用 方法或为属性分配不同的 对象 。To change the culture, you can use the method or assign a different object to the property. 此 设置与语言设置不同。The setting is different from a language setting. 它仅包含与地理区域的标准设置相关的数据。It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region. 使用 `My.Application.CurrentCulture` 属性可获取当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。Use the `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.CurrentCulture` 属性来缓存当前区域性，然后使用将其更改 。This example uses the `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property to cache the current culture before changing it by using . `My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法设置 `My.Resources` 对象用于检索资源的区域性。The `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method sets the culture that the `My.Resources` object uses for retrieving resources. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyResources#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyResources/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 要使此示例正常运行，应用程序必须 `Message` 在应用程序的资源文件中包含一个名为的字符串，应用程序应具有该资源文件的法语区域性版本 `Resources.fr-FR.resx` 。For this example to work, your application must have a string named `Message` in the application's resource file, and the application should have the French-culture version of that resource file, `Resources.fr-FR.resx`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：添加或删除资源](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d). 如果应用程序没有该资源文件的法语区域性版本，则 `My.Resources` 对象将从默认区域性资源文件中检索资源。If the application does not have the French-culture version of that resource file, the `My.Resources` object retrieves the resource from the default-culture resource file.
